alert.note: Alert for Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 01 at 5:50AM EDT until September 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high wave action and strong rip currents. * WHERE...Southern Schoolcraft County. * WHEN...From 11 AM EDT this morning through this evening. * IMPACTS...High wave action and dangerous currents will lead to life threatening swimming conditions. Waves in rapid succession can tire swimmers quickly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Current related fatalities and rescues in the past have occurred due to similar wave conditions at locations listed below: For Southern Schoolcraft County: Near Lakeview Park and Seul Choix Point.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
